page.title: 17Theatres in Yeovil.
page.content: {Johnson Hall. }Built in 1974 and seating a total of 569 persons, (341 in tiered seats),it puts on Wrestling ,Pop Concerts & Opera, Musicals,Exhibitions etc.It has a very large stage,(the proscenium is 42 feet wide),2 bars & a restaurant, besides the auditorium which is octagonal. {The Classic Cinema. }Originally the Odeon,it now consists of two small cinemas on the ground floor seating about 245 people each, & a larger cinema above,seating 600 people.3000 to 4000 people go to perfomances each week. Entrance prices are Adults Â£2, children Â£1 & Senior citizens 75p. {The Swan Theatre. }Members of the company have,since 1972,built a theatre seating 144,extending the original Swan Inn rearwards.They put on 6 shows a year,anything from pantomime to Shakespeare.
